duality_lagrangian_demo.gif.description: Animation showing how the Lagrangian L(x,λ) changes shape as λ varies, providing a lower bound to the primal objective.
duality_lagrangian_demo.gif.caption: The Lagrangian as a pointwise lower bound generator.

duality_saddle_path.gif.description: Visualizing the primal-dual dynamics seeking the saddle point of the Lagrangian (minimizing over x, maximizing over λ).
duality_saddle_path.gif.caption: Saddle point dynamics: seeking the equilibrium.

duality_gap_convergence.gif.description: Plot showing the convergence of the primal value f0(x) and the dual bound g(λ) towards the same optimal value, closing the duality gap.
duality_gap_convergence.gif.caption: Convergence of Primal and Dual values to optimality.

duality_kkt_2d_fast.gif.description: 2D visualization of the unconstrained minimizer of the Lagrangian moving as λ changes, hitting the constraint boundary exactly at the optimal λ.
duality_kkt_2d_fast.gif.caption: Geometric interpretation of KKT Stationarity.

duality_comp_slack_switch.gif.description: Demonstration of complementary slackness: the Lagrange multiplier drops to zero exactly when the constraint becomes inactive.
duality_comp_slack_switch.gif.caption: Complementary Slackness: The multiplier is non-zero only when the constraint binds.

duality_sensitivity_supporting_line_fast.description: Visualizing the dual variable as the slope of the supporting hyperplane to the optimal value function p(u).
duality_sensitivity_supporting_line_fast.caption: Sensitivity Analysis: Dual variables as subgradients of the value function.

duality_farkas_xy_infeasible.gif.description: Geometric visualization of Farkas' Lemma, showing how a dual vector acts as a certificate of infeasibility for a system of inequalities.
duality_farkas_xy_infeasible.gif.caption: Farkas' Lemma: A certificate of infeasibility.
